item.title: Intro to Cyber Security
item.description: Security Engineering Security Engineering is reducing the risk of business operations by building security systems and processes. The consequences of improper security can be very costly: Fines Decreased company valuation Reputational Damage Defensive Techniques They are designed to protect systems, networks, and data from cyber threats.
